name: Bon Terry
description:
The legend goes that once this spirit was a sailor and a man, who by chance crossed paths with Nechrubel, and invited the Foul One out for a round of drinks. It was drunkenly that Ol' Bon made the request...

This optional Monster for MÖRK BORG to add to the strange denizens of the Dying World. Requires: MÖRK BORG core book.
